# Support

Thank you for using TMDB Discover+! This document will help you find the right place to get help.

## How to Get Help

### 1. Check the Documentation First

Before asking for help, please check these resources:

- **[README](../README.md)** - Setup instructions and feature overview
- **[CONTRIBUTING](../CONTRIBUTING.md)** - Development setup and guidelines
- **[SECURITY](../SECURITY.md)** - Security policy and best practices

### 2. Search Existing Issues

Your question might already be answered! Search the [existing issues](https://github.com/semi-column/tmdb-discover-plus/issues) before creating a new one.

### 3. Community Support

- **Discord**: [Join our community](https://discord.gg/uJ8CY5Et2) for real-time help and discussions
- **GitHub Discussions**: [Ask questions](https://github.com/semi-column/tmdb-discover-plus/discussions) and share ideas

## Reporting Issues

### Bug Reports

Found a bug? Please use the [bug report template](https://github.com/semi-column/tmdb-discover-plus/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml) and include:

- Which instance you're using (Stable/Nightly/Self-hosted)
- Steps to reproduce the issue
- Expected vs actual behavior
- Browser and device information
- Screenshots if applicable

### Feature Requests

Have an idea? Use the [feature request template](https://github.com/semi-column/tmdb-discover-plus/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml) and describe:

- The problem you're trying to solve
- Your proposed solution
- Any alternatives you've considered

### Security Vulnerabilities

**DO NOT** open a public issue for security vulnerabilities. Please see our [Security Policy](../SECURITY.md) for responsible disclosure.

## Self-Hosting Help

If you're self-hosting and need help:

1. Check the [Docker setup guide](../README.md#docker-recommended) in the README
2. Verify your environment variables match `.env.example`
3. Check container logs: `docker-compose logs -f`
4. Ensure your database (PostgreSQL/MongoDB) is accessible

## TMDB API Issues

If you're having issues with TMDB data:

1. Verify your API key is valid at [TMDB Settings](https://www.themoviedb.org/settings/api)
2. Check TMDB's [API status](https://status.themoviedb.org/)
3. Ensure you haven't exceeded rate limits

## Response Times

- **Discord**: Usually within a few hours (community-driven)
- **GitHub Issues**: Within 1-3 days
- **Security Issues**: Within 48 hours (see Security Policy)

## Support the Project

If TMDB Discover+ has been helpful, consider supporting development:

- [Ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/semicolumn)
- [Buy Me A Coffee](https://buymeacoffee.com/semi.column)
- Star the repository on GitHub

Thank you for being part of the community!
